name: Caregivers-to-Caregivers (C2C) Dementia
description: This free, 8-session education programme covers topics such as treatment, communication and home care for dementia patients.
content:
#### What will I learn? 
 1. Introduction to Dementia 
 2. Understanding Dementia 
 3. The Brain and Treatment 
 4. Empathy and Compassion 
 5. Communication 
 6. Self-Care 
 7. Home Care for Persons with Dementia 
 8. Graduation
actionable:
To participate in the Caregivers-to-Caregivers program: 
 - Register [here](https://forms.microsoft.com/pages/responsepage.aspx?id=mH6MQ8-ncE-ro_WXOpzXWxnxKEMRtm5Ovb6bTfreWetUMUpDWUtFOFFXRDFUMjJTT1FJOFRSSTFSUS4u&route=shorturl) 
 - See the organiser's [website](https://www.cal.org.sg/c2c)

name: Carer Lighthouse
description: This in-person, two month programme connects caregivers and equips them with relevant resources for support.
